objects.name: Rose
facts: Rose was first scanned on June 17 2025.
Roses are woody perennial flowering plants.
They come in many colors including red, pink, and white.
Rose petals are often used to make perfume.
Roses have been cultivated for over 5,000 years.

objects.name: Sunflower
facts: Sunflower was first scanned on June 17 2025.
Sunflowers can grow up to 12 feet tall.
They follow the sun across the sky (heliotropism).
Sunflower seeds are edible and nutritious.
The flower head is actually made of many small flowers.

objects.name: Tulip
facts: Tulip was first scanned on June 16 2025.
They originated in Central Asia and Turkey.
Tulips come in almost every color except true blue.
The Netherlands is famous for tulip cultivation.
